kv13.8:1.3: Dukkhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci dukkhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, dukkhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:1.5: nanu sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhantīti?
kv13.8:1.7: Hañci sukhābhinandino sattā, atthi keci sukhaṁ patthenti pihenti esanti gavesanti pariyesanti, sukhaṁ ajjhosāya tiṭṭhanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:2.3: Dukkhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, sukhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:2.5: nanu sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetīti?
kv13.8:2.7: Hañci sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayo anuseti, dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayo anuseti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv13.8:3.5: “so evaṁ anurodhavirodhaṁ samāpanno yaṁ kiñci vedanaṁ vedayati sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā, so taṁ vedanaṁ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhatī”ti.
